text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Mm, sounds good. Lookin' forward<n>to it! Hehe. Whew! Just
'cause it's<n>practice doesn't mean I'm gonna go<n>easy on
you! ♪

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: ...Of course! Thank you so much!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Ever since that day, Sakura Chiyono<n>O has been back on
the track from<n>morning until evening, hard at work.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Okay, starting tomorrow I'll try a<n>faster pace during rest
intervals and...<n>Oh, hello!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's poring over the notebook she<n>once dropped in front
of me, her<n>"Chiyonotes."
choice_data_list: Putting those Chiyonotes to good use, I see.
Putting those Chiyonotes to good use, I see.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
These pages contain everything I've<n>learned up until now. I
want to fight<n>with all I've got... or that's the idea, at<n>least.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Because if I'm not in it to win it, well...<n>what's the point?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Soon enough, the day of her practice<n>race with Maruzensky
arrives.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Um... T-today, I... I'm going to run like<n>it's the Japanese
Derby! And I hope<n>you will too!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I'm honored. Well, I guess I'll<n>just have to pull out all
the stops then.

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Hey, look over there!<n>Maruzen's walking up to the
gate...<n>with Chiyo?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As spectators trickle in, the<n>left-handed race over 2,400
meters of<n>life-changing turf begins!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hup!

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, Maruzen just keeps widening<n>her lead. But Chiyo is
playing it totally<n>cool. I know I'd panic and shift gears<n>right
away if it was me...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Strategy? Well... I do sort of<n>have something in mind.
Basically...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
If I try to keep up with the fast pace<n>Maruzen likes to set,
it'll become a<n>battle of endurance, which I can't<n>win.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
So no matter how big a lead she gets,<n>I have to run at my
own pace and<n>conserve strength.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
And then... a-as I head into the final<n>corner, I'll pick up the
pace, somehow<n>close the gap to Maruzen...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: And once I close the gap, if I can justhold on and come out slightly ahead atthe very end... No, not "if"! I will,and then I... I'll win!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
To be honest, I'm lacking in almost<n>every department... But
if I'm going to<n>win, I think that's the best shot I<n>have!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
(Calm down. Just calm down, and<n>keep your own pace...
We're almost<n>at the final corner!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: ...Now! Hahhhh!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
(...That acceleration! I didn't think she<n>had so much left in
the tank.)

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: (...I see you, Chiyo. You really want<n>this, don't you?)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
(So close now. Finish the job. Now's<n>the time to pull
ahead!)

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hehe. Bring it on!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Hryahhh!

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
Geez, Maruzensky's acceleration is<n>really something else!
...Wait, Chiyo's<n>catching up!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Haha!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... No, I'm not done yet!Faster! Faster! FASTER!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Hyrahhh!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
(...Still out of reach. I planned, fought<n>with everything I had,
and it still<n>wasn't good enough.)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: (Nothing's changed. She's still so far<n>away...)

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Chiyo.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for the killer race! It's been a<n>minute since I felt a
thrill like that!<n>Good luck in the real Japanese<n>Derby. Do
what I could only dream of<n>doing.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: You would entrust your dreams... to<n>me?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Mhm. I wouldn't entrust them to<n>anyone else.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Sniffle!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I-I... I thought I would break! You<n>always felt larger than life,
so far out<n>of reach!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Every time I ran, I would get scared,<n>and couldn't win a
single race! But...<n>but still...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I... I want to stand by your side!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: And I... I swear, I will win theJapanese Derby! I will become thenumber one runner!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
So when... when that happens, when<n>I'm stronger... Will you
run with me<n>again?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Haha! Of course!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With the sun itself smiling down on<n>her, Chiyono O's race of
a lifetime<n>comes to a close.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Afterwards, as I'm on my way back<n>to my office...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Oh, um, e-excuse me! Will you be my<n>trainer?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
You made this happen! You were the<n>one who helped me
remember my<n>feelings for Maruzen, who gave me<n>the
push on the back I needed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
So when I make it big—when I have<n>my next showdown
with Maruzen—I<n>want you to be by my side!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her unwavering drive to grow as a<n>runner makes me want
to see just<n>how far she'll go. I have no reason to<n>decline.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Wow, um, yay! Thank you so much!<n>Uhh, in that case... to
commemorate<n>this moment, here's a proverb that<n>just
came to me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
"The carrot knows not when the rain<n>will fall." I look forward
to working<n>with you, Trainer!
